sources.title: Police Story (1985) Jackie Chan: Hong Kong’s one-man army - Martial Arts Action
sources.description:
A virtuous Hong Kong Police Officer must clear his good name when the drug lord he is after frames him for the murder of a dirty cop.

Original title: 警察故事 (Jingcha Gushi)
Alternative titles: Police Force (alternative English title), Jackie Chan’s Police Story (international release).

Director: Jackie Chan.
Writers: Jackie Chan, Edward Tang.

Main cast:
Jackie Chan – Chan Ka-Kui / Kevin Chan 
Brigitte Lin – Selina Fong 
Maggie Cheung – May
Chor Yuen – Chu Tao 
Bill Tung – Inspector Bill Wong

Genres: Martial Arts, Action, Dark Comedy, Slapstick, Crime, Thriller
Release date: December 14, 1985 
Filming location: Hong Kong

NEXT:  Police Story 2 (1988) https://youtu.be/wKLFjTeIjOU


Availability varies by region
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdbtxZGahjOpER2huEhTG9Rb

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Kevin Chan (aka Jackie) is a Hong-Kong cop, who scores his first big hit by virtually single-handedly capturing and arresting a big drug- lord. Of course, the drug-lord isn't too happy about this, and frames Kevin with the murder of another cop (who happened to be on the take). Kevin has to clear his name, whilst keeping himself from getting killed or arrested, and keeping his girlfriend from leaving him.
metadata.Actors: Jackie Chan, Maggie Cheung, Brigitte Lin
